lines.text: Your whole way of life is bullshit! Macho is bullshit!
The only thing you respect is stupidity.
You gonna hide behind your chickenshit homeboys? Where's your pride?
I got one in six chances. I'm gonna beat this bitch.
Are you willing to die for stupidity Cesar? Cause ya see I am, if it'll teach you something.
You're no real teacher, fool. You're just a sub. Wannabe motherfucka.
[Giving Trevor a cactus as a gift]
He and Benny were takers, they want what they want, when they want it, we can't expect the system to protect us.

Like you, I used to think the world was this great place where everybody lived by the same standards I did, then some kid with a nail showed me I was living in his world, a world where chaos rules not order, a world where righteousness is not rewarded. That's Cesar's world, and if you're not willing to play by his rules, then you're gonna have to pay the price.
You do know me, I'm a teacher, just like you.
No, but I fucked a sheep once.

Alright, let's go people, let's go. One minute until tardy lock-down... take your hat off, thank you... let's go, let's go. Everybody move inside, move inside... morning Trevor, good morning. Let's go, get inside... let her go! No smoking - I don't smoke, you don't smoke. Let's go people, today's a *good* day to learn.
For the same reason as you do, for a paycheck.
